sources.title: Cast a Giant Shadow (1966) Kirk Douglas Â· John Wayne
sources.description: The emergence of the state of Israel and the fight for Jewish rights by David Marcus, an American of Jewish descent.. A lavish Hollywood production that gets bogged down in adventure and isn't without its share of melodrama.

metadata.Plot: An American Army officer is recruited by Jews in Palestine to help them form an army. The surrounding Arab countries are opposed to the creation of the state of Israel. He is made commander of the Israeli forces just before the war begins.
metadata.Actors: Kirk Douglas, John Wayne, Frank Sinatra
